name: Unfallen (Duck In A Top Hat Games)
name_original: Unfallen (Duck In A Top Hat Games)
description:
Made for the Giga TriJam 2021. Theme: Death and Rebirth. Definitely went over the 9 hours, forgive me

Also please don't go into full screen if you can see/click the button.  It lets you break out of the window and see stuff you shouldn't.

Description:

Play as two characters caught in a loop in two different games; A hero destined to fail against an evil, and a girl who revives the hero afterwards. Any items you collect in one world are shared in the other world, so swap between the worlds whenever.

Controls:

Movement - wasd, arrows, left joystick

Action - space, bottom/left face button

Pause - esc, the normal pause button on a controller idk what it's called

Change Item - q / left bumper, e / right bumper

Run - left shift , right face button

Assets Used:

Characters: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/rpg-characters/

Tileset: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/rpg-characters/

Font: Dogica https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font

Music (All Royalty Free):

  • Underclocked - Eric Skiff (www.youtube.com/watch?v=v7qO6RcJfqA)
  • Digital Ether - TeknoAXE (www.youtube.com/watch?v=KJKswU24TWQ)
  • 8-bit Explore - Heatley Bros (www.youtube.com/watch?v=iX6xUbI_LYU)

It's 4:30 AM. It's due in 30 minutes. I need to sleep now. Hopefully there aren't any game breaking bugs.
developers: Duck In A Top Hat Games
